title: Wing
description:
A single white wing with feathers. 

Can be used to talk about flying, both literally and metaphorical. May be used in phrases such as when pigs fly or time flies. May also be used to talk about angels or to say that someone or something is angelic.
apple_vendor_description: The wing emoji on Apple devices is rendered with a soft, feathered texture, suggesting a gentle motion and ethereal grace. Its pristine white plumage is highlighted by subtle gradients and realistic lighting, giving it a three-dimensional, almost tangible quality. This emoji on Apple devices evokes feelings of freedom, aspiration, and a touch of the divine, perfect for conveying a sense of soaring ambition or gentle support in digital conversations.
